get_coreurl[source]

get_coreurl(local:bool=True, coreurl:Optional[str]=None)

Set the core url for convenience

Type Default Details
local bool True If local uses local node, else uses Infura.io gateway
coreurl typing.Optional[str] None No Content

Type Default Details
coreurl str No Content
cid str The path to the IPFS object(s) to be outputted
kwargs No Content

class DownloadDir[source]

DownloadDir(coreurl:str, root_cid:str, output_fol:str)

Download a IPFS directory to your local disk
